baseline_groups.claim_summary: Damage exponent d2 in power-law climate damage function D(T) = d1 * T^d2, estimated via OLS regression of log(damages) on log(temperature) using Howard & Sterner (2017) meta-analysis data.
baseline_groups.notes: Single OLS regression from Table 1. The paper is primarily a structural/computational model; this is the only regression-type content. The coefficient represents the power-law exponent of the temperature-damage relationship.

global_notes: No changes to baseline group assignments relative to the surface. The surface correctly identified one baseline group covering the single OLS regression in this structural/computational paper.
